lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Inflationary pressure increased during the quarter and investment plans for the next year were scaled down, which the survey said could limit activity in the medium to short term.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Respondents said finance was harder to obtain, which Westpac chief economist Bob Graham said was probably because of high interest rates rather than the availability of money.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After expecting improvements in two previous quarterly surveys, 56 pct of respondents reported working at less than satisfactory levels, with insufficient orders nominated by 70 pct as the major constraint.
